displayName: I Don't Care About Commit Message - Custom
description: Yet another AI git commit plugin, but without the need for manual confirmation.
command.selectCopilotModel: AI Git Commit: Select Copilot Model
config.useConventionalCommit: Whether to use conventional commit format
config.useCopilot: Use GitHub Copilot instead of OpenAI API (requires Copilot subscription)
config.selectedCopilotModel: ID of the selected Copilot model
config.systemPrompt: System prompt for AI to generate commit messages
config.minimalPrompt: System prompt for AI to generate minimal commit messages
config.excludedLockfiles: List of lockfiles to exclude from git diff analysis
